newsitem.title: CHINA: China to build 3.0 bln yuan fertiliser plant.
newsitem.headline: China to build 3.0 bln yuan fertiliser plant.

text.p: China will start work soon on a 3.0 billion yuan fertiliser plant in northwestern Xinjiang region, the China News Service said on Thursday.
The plant would be located in oil-rich Kuqa county and construction work would start soon, the agency said but gave no precise dates.
The plant was expected to produce 300,000 tonnes of synthetic ammomia and 520,000 tonnes of urea each year after going into operation in 1999, it said.
Xinjiang region aimed to become one of China's largest nitrogenous fertiliser producers after the plant start production, it said.
